description: Your knowledge of your enemies' vulnerable spots is especially punishing.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Sneak attack +6d6, Critical Focus, any critical feat, base attack bonus +9.

sections.text: Whenever you successfully sneak attack an opponent for a second time on your turn, you can spend a swift action to apply the effects of one critical feat you know to that opponent.
sections.name: Benefits

name: Sneaking Precision
